allow: Bash(docker compose exec postgres pg_isready -U postgres)

Bash(docker exec ai-driven-risk-analytics-postgres-1 psql -U postgres -d incident_intel -c "\\dt")
Bash(docker exec ai-driven-risk-analytics-postgres-1 psql -U postgres -d incident_intel -c "\\di")
